newsitem.title: CANADA: Bank Canada sees 97 inflation at low end of range.
newsitem.headline: Bank Canada sees 97 inflation at low end of range.

text.p: The Bank of Canada said on Tuesday in its winter review that it expects the nation's economy to grow in 1997 while inflation remains low.
The central bank said growth will eat away at Canada's three-percent output gap but not eliminate it.
The bank said growth will come from increased household spending and business investment.
